TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit IcmpV6Statistics extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供本地计算机的 Internet 协议版本 6 (ICMPv6) Internet 控制消息协议的统计数据。

span.span: Provides Internet Control Message Protocol for Internet Protocol version 6 (ICMPv6) statistical data for the local computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ICMPV6 是一组的错误消息和信息性消息用于 Internet 协议版本 6 (IPv6)。ICMPV6 is a set of error and informational messages for use with Internet Protocol version 6 (IPv6). 此类由方法以返回 ICMPV6 流量信息。This class is used by the method to return ICMPV6 traffic information. 此类中的属性关联的管理信息基础对象 ICMPv6 IETF RFC 2466 中定义。The properties in this class correlate to the Management Information Base objects for ICMPv6 defined in IETF RFC 2466. ICMPv6 RFC 2463 中定义。ICMPv6 is defined in RFC 2463. ## Examples 下面的示例显示当前 ICMPv6 统计信息。The following example displays the current ICMPv6 statistics. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfoReport#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CPP/netinfo.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfoReport#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CS/netinfo.cs#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数可以调用仅由派生自的类。This constructor can be called only by classes that derive from .

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property DestinationUnreachableMessagesReceived As Long
public: abstract property long DestinationUnreachableMessagesReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取由于无法到达数据包的目标地址而接收的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 6 (ICMPv6) 消息数。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 6 (ICMPv6) messages received because of a packet having an unreachable address in its destination.

value.span: 值，指定接收的“无法到达目标”消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of Destination Unreachable messages received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无法到达目标的消息可以发送到的计算机均数据包的源由于以下原因导致：A Destination Unreachable message can be sent to the computer that is the source of a packet for any of the following reasons: - 计算机无法找到路由到的目标地址。The computer cannot find a route to the destination address. - 通过管理方式禁止与目标地址的通信。Communication with the destination address is administratively prohibited. 例如，防火墙会阻止数据包的传递到目标。For example, a firewall prevents delivery of packets to the destination. - 目标地址不可用。The destination address is unreachable. - 目标端口不可用。The destination port is unreachable. 例如，没有可用于数据包的协议的任何侦听器。For example, there is no listener available for the packet's protocol. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#32](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#32)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#32](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#32)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#32](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#32)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property DestinationUnreachableMessagesSent As Long
public: abstract property long DestinationUnreachableMessagesSent { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取由于无法到达数据包的目标地址而发送的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 6 (ICMPv6) 消息数。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 6 (ICMPv6) messages sent because of a packet having an unreachable address in its destination.

value.span: 值，指定发送的“无法到达目标”消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of Destination Unreachable messages sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无法到达目标的消息可以发送到的计算机均数据包的源由于以下原因导致：A Destination Unreachable message can be sent to the computer that is the source of a packet for any of the following reasons: - 计算机无法找到路由到的目标地址。The computer cannot find a route to the destination address. - 通过管理方式禁止与目标地址的通信。Communication with the destination address is administratively prohibited. 例如，防火墙会阻止数据包的传递到目标。For example, a firewall prevents delivery of packets to the destination. - 目标地址不可用。The destination address is unreachable. - 目标端口不可用。The destination port is unreachable. 例如，没有可用于数据包的协议的任何侦听器。For example, there is no listener available for the packet's protocol. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#32](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#32)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#32](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#32)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#32](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#32)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property EchoRepliesReceived As Long
public: abstract property long EchoRepliesReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取接收的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 6 (ICMPv6) 回送答复消息数。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 6 (ICMPv6) Echo Reply messages received.

value.span: 值，指定接收到的“ICMP 回送答复”消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of number of ICMP Echo Reply messages received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 回显请求和回显答复消息允许计算机从网络上的远程计算机中请求了 ICMP 响应。Echo Request and Echo Reply messages allow a computer to request an ICMP response from a remote computer on a network. 此功能通常用于确定远程地址的有效性。This functionality is often used to determine the validity of remote addresses. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#30](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#30)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#30)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#30)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property MembershipQueriesReceived As Long
public: abstract property long MembershipQueriesReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取接收的 Internet 组管理协议 (IGMP) 组成员查询消息数。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Group management Protocol (IGMP) Group Membership Query messages received.

value.span: 值，指定接收的组成员查询消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of Group Membership Query messages received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 多播的路由器发送组成员身份查询消息以了解哪些组具有成员上每个其附加的物理网络。Multicast routers send Group Membership Query messages to learn which groups have members on each of their attached physical networks. 主机计算机通过为每个主机通过联接的多播组发送组成员身份报告对组成员身份查询消息做出响应。Host computers respond to a Group Membership Query message by sending a Group Membership Report for each multicast group joined by the host. 主机计算机加入新的多播的组时，还可以发送组成员身份报告。A host computer can also send a Group Membership Report when it joins a new multicast group. 在主计算机离开多播的组时，会发送组成员减少消息。Group Membership Reduction messages are sent when a host computer leaves a multicast group. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#34](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#34)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#34](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#34)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#34](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#34)]

public: abstract property long MembershipQueriesSent { long get(); };

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 6 (ICMPv6) messages received.

value.span: 值，指定接收的 ICMPv6 消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMPv6 messages received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ICMPv6 消息将发送错误以及关于使用 Internet 协议版本 6 (IPv6) 发送的数据包的信息进行通信。ICMPv6 messages are sent to communicate errors and information about packets sent using Internet Protocol version 6 (IPv6). ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#33](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#33)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#33](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#33)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#33](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#33)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property MessagesSent As Long
public: abstract property long MessagesSent { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取发送的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 6 (ICMPv6) 消息数。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 6 (ICMPv6) messages sent.

value.span: 值，指定发送的 ICMPv6 消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMPv6 messages sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ICMPv6 消息将发送错误以及关于使用 Internet 协议版本 6 (IPv6) 发送的数据包的信息进行通信。ICMPv6 messages are sent to communicate errors and information about packets sent using Internet Protocol version 6 (IPv6). ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#33](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#33)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#33](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#33)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#33](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#33)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property NeighborAdvertisementsReceived As Long
public: abstract property long NeighborAdvertisementsReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取接收的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 6 (ICMPv6) 邻居广播消息数。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 6 (ICMPv6) Neighbor Advertisement messages received.

value.span: 值，指定接收的 ICMP 邻居广播消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMP Neighbor Advertisement messages received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 邻居发现是凭此主机计算机和路由器可以确定地址的邻居已知驻留在共享的链接上一个过程。Neighbor Discovery is a process whereby host computers and routers can determine the addresses for neighbors known to reside on shared links. 此发现过程的一部分被通过调用相邻节点请求和邻居播发的 ICMP 消息。Part of this discovery process is accomplished using ICMP messages called Neighbor Solicitations and Neighbor Advertisements. 发现邻居的链路层地址或验证邻居仍可以访问通过缓存的链路层地址发送相邻节点请求消息。Neighbor Solicitation messages are sent to discover the link-layer address of a neighbor or to verify that a neighbor is still reachable via a cached link-layer address. 包含的地址信息邻居播发会在响应请求，或地宣布地址更改而发送。A Neighbor Advertisement that contains address information is sent in response to a solicitation or to announce an address change. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#35](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#35)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#35](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#35)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#35](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#35)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property NeighborAdvertisementsSent As Long
public: abstract property long NeighborAdvertisementsSent { long get(); };

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 6 (ICMPv6) Neighbor Advertisement messages sent.

value.span: 值，指定发送的邻居广播消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of Neighbor Advertisement messages sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 邻居发现是凭此主机计算机和路由器可以确定地址的邻居已知驻留在共享的链接上一个过程。Neighbor Discovery is a process whereby host computers and routers can determine the addresses for neighbors known to reside on shared links. 此发现过程的一部分被通过调用相邻节点请求和邻居播发的 ICMP 消息。Part of this discovery process is accomplished using ICMP messages called Neighbor Solicitations and Neighbor Advertisements. 发现邻居的链路层地址或验证邻居仍可以访问通过缓存的链路层地址发送相邻节点请求消息。Neighbor Solicitation messages are sent to discover the link-layer address of a neighbor or to verify that a neighbor is still reachable via a cached link-layer address. 包含的地址信息邻居播发会在响应请求，或地宣布地址更改而发送。A Neighbor Advertisement that contains address information is sent in response to a solicitation or to announce an address change. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#35](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#35)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#35](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#35)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#35](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#35)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property PacketTooBigMessagesReceived As Long
public: abstract property long PacketTooBigMessagesReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取接收的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 6 (ICMPv6) 数据包太大消息数。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 6 (ICMPv6) Packet Too Big messages received.

value.span: 值，指定接收的 ICMP 数据包太大消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMP Packet Too Big messages received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 路由器发送数据包太大消息时不能转发数据包，因为它是大于传出链接的最大传输单元 (MTU)。A router sends a Packet Too Big message when a packet cannot be forwarded because it is larger than the maximum transmission unit (MTU) of the outgoing link. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#36](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#36)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#36](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#36)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#36](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#36)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 路由器发送数据包太大消息时不能转发数据包，因为它是大于传出链接的最大传输单元 (MTU)。A router sends a Packet Too Big message when a packet cannot be forwarded because it is larger than the maximum transmission unit (MTU) of the outgoing link. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#36](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#36)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#36](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#36)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#36](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#36)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property ParameterProblemsReceived As Long
public: abstract property long ParameterProblemsReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取接收的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 6 (ICMPv6) 参数问题消息数。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 6 (ICMPv6) Parameter Problem messages received.

value.span: 值，指定接收到的“ICMP 参数问题”消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMP Parameter Problem messages received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主机计算机时，将发送参数问题消息或路由器在处理数据包标头，如遇到无效的 IPv6 选项或无效的下一步的标头类型的内容时遇到问题。Parameter Problem messages are sent when a host computer or router encounters problems while processing the contents of a packet header, such as encountering a invalid IPv6 option or a invalid Next Header type. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#39](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#39)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#39](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#39)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#39](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#39)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property ParameterProblemsSent As Long
public: abstract property long ParameterProblemsSent { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取发送的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 6 (ICMPv6) 参数问题消息数。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 6 (ICMPv6) Parameter Problem messages sent.

value.span: 值，指定已发送的“ICMP 参数问题”消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMP Parameter Problem messages sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主机计算机时，将发送参数问题消息或路由器在处理数据包标头，如遇到了无效的 IPv6 选项或无效的下一步的标头类型的内容时遇到问题。Parameter Problem messages are sent when a host computer or router encounters problems while processing the contents of a packet header, such as encountering an invalid IPv6 option or an invalid Next Header type. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#39](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#39)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#39](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#39)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#39](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#39)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property RedirectsReceived As Long
public: abstract property long RedirectsReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取接收的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 6 (ICMPv6) 重定向消息数。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 6 (ICMPv6) Redirect messages received.

value.span: 值，指定接收到的“ICMP 重定向”消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMP Redirect messages received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 路由器发送重定向消息以通知主机计算机的目标地址的更好地路由。Redirect messages are sent by routers to inform a host computer of a better route for a destination address. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#37](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#37)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#37](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#37)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#37](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#37)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property RedirectsSent As Long
public: abstract property long RedirectsSent { long get(); };

value.span: 值，指定已发送的“ICMP 重定向”消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMP Redirect messages sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 路由器发送重定向消息以通知主机计算机的目标地址的更好地路由。Redirect messages are sent by routers to inform a host computer of a better route for a destination address. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#37](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#37)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#37](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#37)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#37](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#37)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property RouterAdvertisementsReceived As Long
public: abstract property long RouterAdvertisementsReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取接收的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 6 (ICMPv6) 路由器广播消息数。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 6 (ICMPv6) Router Advertisement messages received.

value.span: 值，指定接收的路由器广播消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of Router Advertisement messages received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主机计算机可以将超出其直接附加的子网的 IP 数据报发送之前，它必须发现该子网上的至少一个路由器的地址。Before a host computer can send IP datagrams beyond its directly attached subnet, it must discover the address of at least one router on that subnet. 可以使用 ICMP 消息调用路由器播发和路由器请求来实现此发现。This discovery can be accomplished using ICMP messages called Router Advertisements and Router Solicitations. 发送通知消息时由路由器定期地宣布它的存在和其接口的地址。An Advertisement message is sent by a router periodically to announce its presence and the addresses of its interfaces. 当计算机连接到网络，而不等待接收路由器播发时，它可以发送路由器请求以请求路由器立即发送其播发。When a computer connects to a network, rather than waiting to receive Router Advertisements, it can send Router Solicitations to request that routers send their advertisements immediately. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#40](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#40)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#40)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#40)]

public: abstract property long RouterAdvertisementsSent { long get(); };

value.span: 值，指定发送的路由器广播消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of Router Advertisement messages sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主机计算机可以将超出其直接附加的子网的 IP 数据报发送之前，它必须发现该子网上的至少一个路由器的地址。Before a host computer can send IP datagrams beyond its directly attached subnet, it must discover the address of at least one router on that subnet. 可以使用 ICMP 消息调用路由器播发和路由器请求来实现此发现。This discovery can be accomplished using ICMP messages called Router Advertisements and Router Solicitations. 发送通知消息时由路由器定期地宣布它的存在和其接口的地址。An Advertisement message is sent by a router periodically to announce its presence and the addresses of its interfaces. 当计算机连接到网络，而不等待接收路由器播发时，它可以发送路由器请求以请求路由器立即发送其播发。When a computer connects to a network, rather than waiting to receive Router Advertisements, it can send Router Solicitations to request that routers send their advertisements immediately. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#40](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#40)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#40)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#40)]

public: abstract property long RouterSolicitsSent { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取发送的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 6 (ICMPv6) 路由器请求消息数。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 6 (ICMPv6) Router Solicitation messages sent.

value.span: 值，指定发送的路由器请求消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of Router Solicitation messages sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主机计算机可以将超出其直接附加的子网的 IP 数据报发送之前，它必须发现该子网上的至少一个路由器的地址。Before a host computer can send IP datagrams beyond its directly attached subnet, it must discover the address of at least one router on that subnet. 可以使用 ICMP 消息调用路由器播发和路由器请求来实现此发现。This discovery can be accomplished using ICMP messages called Router Advertisements and Router Solicitations. 发送通知消息时由路由器定期地宣布它的存在和其接口的地址。An Advertisement message is sent by a router periodically to announce its presence and the addresses of its interfaces. 当计算机连接到网络，而不等待接收路由器播发时，它可以发送路由器请求以请求路由器立即发送其播发。When a computer connects to a network, rather than waiting to receive Router Advertisements, it can send Router Solicitations to request that routers send their advertisements immediately. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#40](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#40)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#40)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#40)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property TimeExceededMessagesReceived As Long
public: abstract property long TimeExceededMessagesReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取接收的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 6 (ICMPv6) 超时消息数。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 6 (ICMPv6) Time Exceeded messages received.

value.span: 值，指定接收到的“ICMP 超时”消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMP Time Exceeded messages received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据包的跃点限制用于确定可以将其转发之前会丢弃该消息的次数。A packet's Hop Limit determines how many times it can be forwarded before it is discarded. 转发数据包时，每次其跃点的限制值将减少 1。Each time a packet is forwarded, its Hop Limit value is decremented by one. 当跃点限制为零时，或当路由器接收其跃点限制设置为零的数据包时，会丢弃该数据包和数据包的源收到指示初始的跃点限制太小或数据包陷入 rou 的时间超过消息做到的一循环。When the Hop Limit reaches zero or when a router receives a packet with its Hop Limit set to zero, the packet is discarded and the source of the packet receives a Time Exceeded message indicating that the initial Hop Limit was too small or that the packet was caught in a routing loop. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#38](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#38)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#38](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#38)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#38](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#38)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property TimeExceededMessagesSent As Long
public: abstract property long TimeExceededMessagesSent { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取发送的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 6 (ICMPv6) 超时消息数。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 6 (ICMPv6) Time Exceeded messages sent.

value.span: 值，指定已发送的“ICMP 超时”消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMP Time Exceeded messages sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据包的跃点限制用于确定可以将其转发之前会丢弃该消息的次数。A packet's Hop Limit determines how many times it can be forwarded before it is discarded. 转发数据包时，每次其跃点的限制值将减少 1。Each time a packet is forwarded, its Hop Limit value is decremented by one. 当跃点限制为零时，或当路由器接收其跃点限制设置为零的数据包时，会丢弃该数据包和数据包的源收到指示初始的跃点限制太小或数据包陷入 rou 的时间超过消息做到的一循环。When the Hop Limit reaches zero or when a router receives a packet with its Hop Limit set to zero, the packet is discarded and the source of the packet receives a Time Exceeded message indicating that the initial Hop Limit was too small or that the packet was caught in a routing loop. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#38](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#38)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#38](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#38)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#38](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#38)]
